casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Mario Paul Mikolitch (10149)

Daly, Foti and Heiman, Js.

Argued October 28 decision released November 19, 1991 Mario Paul Mikolitch, pro se, the appellant (defendant). Jack W. Fischer, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were C. Robert Satti, state’s *916attorney, and Richard Preston, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
